Under Tomcat 3.2.4 we were able to post an xml string to a servlet from a
vb application. Under Tomcat 4, using the same application and testing, we 
found that the servlet only received "null". Is this a new security restriction 
implemented since 3.2.*? Any help would be greatly appreciated. 
URGENT : We must use Tomcat 4!!

thanx,

george

text:
An HTTP request, whether remote or coming from the localhost, should be handled
the same way.
Only stating that it "only received "null"" isn't helping much understanding the
issue.
